tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE communication_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    communication_type VARCHAR(100),
    communication_date DATE,
    communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_details (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50),
    last_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_id INT,
    rating INT,
    feedback_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Customer (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                  customer_name VARCHAR(50),
                  contact_number VARCHAR(20),
                  email_address VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE Interaction (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                     interaction_date DATE,
                     customer_id INT REFERENCES Customer(customer_id),
                     interaction_type VARCHAR(20),
                     interaction_notes VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE ServiceAgent (agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                      agent_name VARCHAR(50),
                      agent_email VARCHAR(50))

CREATE TABLE Department (dept_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
                      dept_name VARCHAR(50),
                      manager_id INT REFERENCES ServiceAgent(agent_id))

CREATE TABLE interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    interaction_date DATE,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE employee_interactions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    interaction_date DATE,
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    interaction_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT REFERENCES customers(customer_id),
    feedback_date DATE,
    rating INT,
    feedback_description TEXT
);
